term: Why is A2S2 so clumped and not enumerated?
content:
we don’t exactly define the powers of the president because we don’t know what to give it; we've never had a president before
	we’ve had a congress before ish, but we have absolutely no clue about president so far and what he is going to do

we cannot be so significant to the point where we are able to number out the powers

they cannot be so specific and we are going to assign roles and more flexible powers cuz we don’t know where/how to be specific
